pic1_alt: Hex logo for the taylor R package. A pixelated image of Taylor Swift's face in the bottom 2/3 of the hex, with Taylor in her handwriting script across the middle.
pic2_alt: The most used positive and negative words in Taylor Swift's songs. Love is in the middle and the largest word. Other frequent positive words are beautiful, loved, smile, lucky, shine, darling, fun, cool, free and easy. Other frequent negative words are shake, break, mad, bad, hurt, dark, wrong, fall and lost.
